Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
Write-Output "Shortcut: $($OctopusParameters['shortcutPath'])\$($OctopusParameters['shortcutName'])"
Write-Output "Target: $($OctopusParameters['targetFilePath'])"

if(!(Test-Path $shortcutPath)){
    New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $shortcutPath
}

$WshShell = New-Object -comObject WScript.Shell
$Shortcut = $WshShell.CreateShortcut("$($OctopusParameters['shortcutPath'])\$($OctopusParameters['shortcutName']).lnk")
$Shortcut.TargetPath = $OctopusParameters['targetFilePath']
$Shortcut.Save()

Parameters.Name: targetFilePath
Parameters.Label: Target file the shortcut will reference
Parameters.HelpText: This should be set to the file that the shortcut will link to.

Parameters.Name: shortcutPath
Parameters.Label: The path the shortcut will be put in
Parameters.HelpText: This should include a path that the shortcut should live in.  If the path does not exist, it will be created.

Parameters.Name: shortcutName
Parameters.Label: The name of the shortcut
Parameters.HelpText: This should be the name of the shortcut.
